Refactoring _get_group_notice API models based on OpenAPI spec.
- Created GetGroupNoticeReq with group_id (int | str).
- Created nested MessageItem model for message parts (id, height, width).
- Created nested NoticeItem model for data items (notice_id, sender_id, publish_time, message).
- Created GetGroupNoticeRes with standard fields (status, retcode, data, message, wording, echo) and nested types.
- Used Literal["ok"] for status.
- Used int | str for group_id.
- Used str | None for echo.
- Added descriptions using Field.
- Removed unused imports.
- Kept the API definition class GetGroupNoticeAPI.
